data.title: Best Juicing place I have ever been too
data.text: I have tried many different juice but their recipes are absolutely the best. They let you sample them before purchasing. Their drinks and bowls are delicious and healty

data.title: Healthy Juice although a bit expensive
data.text: I dropped by Raw Juice for lunch as I love fresh pressed juice.  They make the juice there and have several varieties.  I prefer green varieties and they had several available to sample.  I enjoyed the opportunity to taste as I changed my mind on my initial selection.  Only complaint is that it was kind of expensive.  But that is probably the Boca factor!

data.title: Healthy and delicious
data.text: All organic cold pressed juices, smoothies,  and other healthy choices make this places winner.  You can design your own smoothie, have a "shot" of a healthy juice, or  choose from an assortment of chia bowls, salads and parfaits, all organic.

data.title: Healthy healthy heathy!
data.text: Great place for any number of freshest juices and combination bowls anywhere. I personally love the raw oatmeal parfait and have it a couple of times a week, or try the delicious hemp bowl.

data.title: Healthiest Food you'll ever eat!
data.text: I love the bowls and the raw juice of course.  The salads are excellent, especially the quinoa and kale.  If you want a healthy, nothing artificial added, this is it.  Also the great cookies and brownies - how do they do it?  It is a little expensive, but worth it to yourself!

data.title: Excellent! Very welcoming and informative
data.text:
Went here to grab a quick juice after a day at the beach.  I had a head cold and asked for a suggestion for a smoothie that might help.  They recommended an amazing smoothie (POPEYE
Pineapple, Peach, Green Apple, Cucumber, Kale, Ginger, Spirulina, Vega Protein, garnished with Bee Pollen, Raw Honey, Hemp Seeds)  The owner then gave me a Ginger shot on the house which really made my day!  He explained the benefits of ginger and how it would help my cold.  I will absolutely be coming back !

data.title: Great spot!
data.text: So happy I found this spot- staff is super friendly and eager to give you samples of you want to try any of the juices. The store was super busy, but their customer service was great and we were served promptly. Love it!

data.title: Consistently Good
data.text: Great place to get a healthful drink and or healthy eats. The servers are always friendly and attentive. Doesn't get five stars because they keep asking me for my phone number and I find this annoying. Also they say they don't know how many calories are in their smoothies and in this day and age, I think that is ridiculous. Fine if you don't want to post that information, but at least have it available if a customer asks.

data.title: Juices and Smoothies!!!
data.text: I'm a smoothie/Juice lover and this place doesn't disappoint!!! they use great ingredients on their smoothies. Friendly staff!! they even gave us samples some juices for free, I tried like 7 different ones!

data.title: Great assistance on cleanse
data.text: Visited the East Boca Raton location and Nick was a great help with setting up a custom one day juice cleanse.   Let me taste test and asked questions specific to building the cleanse.  I will be back and I will ask for Nick.

data.title: Amazing !!!!!
data.text: I recently saw an advertisement for this juice bar on Facebook so I decided to give it a try, I went to the location in Aventura and I was blown away. Not only is the juice so so good, but the staff totally won me over. They were so helpful and very knowledgeable about the products and let me sample as many juices as I wanted to! Absolutely amazing I cannot wait to go back and try their food !!!

data.title: I do not get it but my family does!
data.text: Came here with my son as he loves the fruit bowls. Raw Juce is another example of an expensive fad restaurant in Boca. People spending $20 for a fruit bowl and a smoothie for lunch. Outside of fruit bowls with many fresh ingredients there really is not much else to eat there. But again they have a following and the rest o my family love it here. If you sign into Facebook you get a ree juce shot. The coffee juce shot was good.

data.title: I don't get it
data.text:
Maybe I just don't get it.  A bunch of hipster-doofuses walking around drinking overpriced juice and swearing that they are getting healthier by the second.  

It's organic, it's pure, it's wholesome.........it's a freaking rip off is what it is.

data.title: YUMMY Tastings, Great Energy and .......JUCE!
data.text: Stopped in today and loved the Juice tastings. Also went home with many of the Green Juices. The coconut water was great too. Will try the shots too. Staff friendly too!

data.title: LOVE RAW!!! (Organic Too!)
data.text:
IF you love healthy and delicious then make sure that you make it to RAW JUCE: Once you go to Raw, you will be addicted and that's awesome because it is healthy!!
I love the acai bowls, juices, smoothies, kale salad, shots . . . ok so there is nothing that I do not like at Raw . . . you can grab something to go, commit to a cleanse, yoga on the roof at the boca east location, eat and/or drink there . . . great place to meet a friend too!!  Checkin to facebook or instagram for a free shot!  No worries about becoming an "addict" as they are opening up new locations to meet our needs (: 
already open: palm beach gardens, east and central boca, and miami too!

data.title: What a TREAT
data.text: This spot is not easy to find, but persevere! The drinks are excellent and FRESH! Great service. Pricey - but worth it!!

data.title: FUN
data.text:
very delicious and fresh food 
I'll be back soon to taste the juice.
The bowl with the fruit was tasty and colorful 😍 
Nice service

data.title: THE BEST !
data.text: fresh organic ingredients and always lots of delicious green juices on hand.....easy to run in and out....with all the goodness you need for the day....!!!   We need more organic healthy eateries like this in  South Florida......This is the wave of the world.... We are blessed to live so close to a place that does fresh organic cold pressed juices.

data.title: Juice cleanse
data.text: Huge selection of juices, from any color and for special needs too. If you are not sure what you should get, you can ask the staff for help (they will, eventually help you) and you can get samples from any of their juices. My friend was there for a cleanse and they offered her several options. However, not the cheapest thing.

data.title: LOVE RAW JUCE!!!
data.text: Raw Juce is amazing!!  From the smoothies to the bowls, salads and shots (not those shots) . . . I love them!! Eat Organic & Raw!! As the name states you can "Juce" too!!  They even have a rewards program . . . I think you get what you pay for so of course there are less expensive places to get a smoothie but I think the price is great for those that like it fresh, raw, and organic.
